content.value:
Compare two numbers: how much money you're allowed to spend on a book, conference, or software without approval.

And how many people you can invite to an hour-long meeting multiplied by their average hourly compensation.
content.html: Compare two numbers: how much money you're allowed to spend on a book, conference, or software without approval. And how many people you can invite to an hour-long meeting multiplied by their average hourly compensation.
